author: Marty Johnson
title: Guiliani slams WHO, China for coronavirus response
description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani, who also serves as President Trump's personal lawyer on Sunday took a swipe at China and the World Health Organization (WHO) over their handling of the COVID-19 pandemic. "...
